price: ߜߍ߬ߘߍ ߞߊߣߵߊߟߎ߫ ߞߎ߲߬ߠߊߛߊ߬ߦߌ߫ ߘߋ߬ ߸ ߓߊ ߏ߬ ߦߴߊߟߎ߫ ߖߎ߯ ߘߐߜߍ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: وَلَا يَصُدَّنَّكُمُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمۡ عَدُوّٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walā yaṣuddannakumu al-shayṭānu innahu lakum ʿaduwwun mubīnun
